definitions.definition: A grammatical device to mark quoted speech , such as be like in "he was like, 'who are you?'".
A form of the complementizer related to the verb say , found in many languages of West Africa and South Asia .

main_definition: ( grammar ) A grammatical device to mark quoted speech , such as be like in "he was like, 'who are you?'".
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) A form of the complementizer related to the verb say , found in many languages of West Africa and South Asia .
